acquire-3g-ticket.additional-information: u can import your Green Pass by scanning the corresponding QR code. Alternatively, you can select a PDF document or an image with the QR code.
acquire-3g-ticket.confirm-checkbox-valid-cert-text: I confirm the accuracy of my evidence and understand that any misuse of the greenlight app or the provision of incorrect data can lead to legal consequences.
acquire-3g-ticket.confirm-not-checked-body: Please confirm that the information you have provided is correct and that you are aware that misuse of the greenlight app may lead to legal consequences
acquire-3g-ticket.create-ticket-success-body: The acquired entrance ticket for {{place}} was successfully created.
acquire-3g-ticket.filepicker-context: Choose PDF or image for verification
acquire-3g-ticket.found-valid-3g-preCheck: Stored valid evidence could be found.
acquire-3g-ticket.found-valid-selftest-preCheck: A locally saved self-test was found.
acquire-3g-ticket.invalid-body: Please try again with another document.
acquire-3g-ticket.invalid-document: The evidence is currently not valid for {{place}}.
acquire-3g-ticket.invalid-qr-body: The QR code does not contain a valid evidence.
acquire-3g-ticket.manage-tickets-text: Active tickets could be found. You can manage your active tickets at:
acquire-3g-ticket.no-photo-body: There is no valid photo of your student or staff ID in {{serviceName}}. Please contact the studies department.
acquire-3g-ticket.not-same-person: The person in the uploaded evidence does not match the person logged in.
acquire-3g-ticket.photo-not-available-body: No photo of your student or staff ID card could be loaded from {{serviceName}}. Please try again at a later time.
acquire-3g-ticket.self-test-information: Please check whether the evidence is still valid.
acquire-3g-ticket.trust-and-save-1: I agree to import my evidence and store this data on my device.
acquire-3g-ticket.trust-and-save-2: Your data is stored and processed exclusively on this device. There is no automatic transfer of an imported evidence between devices. The evidence imported on other devices is only available on these devices.

error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!
error-permission-message: This function is currently only available for students!

hcert.cert-not-valid-error: Does not comply with the following rules: {{error}}

no-tickets-message: You do not have any tickets!
reload-error-body: The update failed. Check your internet connection, log in again or try again later.
self-test-not-supported-body: Antigen tests with self-acceptance ("self-tests") are no longer permitted as proof of entry.

show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-green-pass-valid: Green Pass imported and valid on this device
show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-invalid: No valid evidence found on this device
show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-invalid-text: You may have imported your evidence on another device, the evidence is no longer valid or the application has not been used for a longer period of time.
show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-maximize-saving: Add the app to the home screen of your smartphone to maximize the storage time of the evidence.
show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-selftest: Self-test imported on this device, manual control necessary
show-active-tickets.delete-ticket-notfound-body: No active ticket: {{place}} was found. The ticket has probably already expired or deleted.
show-active-tickets.delete-ticket-success-body: The ticket for {{place}} was successfully deleted.
show-active-tickets.invalid-evidence: If the evidence is no longer valid, you can create a new ticket and upload a new evidence.
show-active-tickets.logged-out-body: The session has expired. Please log in again.
show-active-tickets.no-evidence: No valid stored evidence was found. Show your evidence manually or upload a new evidence by creating a new ticket.
show-active-tickets.self-test-information: Please check whether the evidence is still valid.

show-reference-ticket.description: At this point the validity of an entrance ticket is displayed. Whether a ticket is active or inactive depends on the evidence imported on the controlled person's device. The reference ticket does not entitle you to enter rooms at the university.
show-reference-ticket.information-container-body: If a valid health certificate is available on this device then its QR code is displayed and the ticket is shown in color. This QR code can be checked with GreenCheck. If a self-test that was issued by Land Steiermark or Land KÃ¤rnten is available on this device then its QR code is displayed and the ticket is shown in black and white. This QR code cannot be validated by this app, therefore its validation requires a QR code scanner. If a valid university-internal test is available on this device then the ticket is shown in color. Manual validation of this test can only be done with the original document.

validity-tooltip: According to the current regulations of {{place}}. The validity period is automatically updated when the regulations change.
validity-tooltip-ticket-text: The ticket is only valid in electronic form.
